description:
eQuran offers an enriching way to connect with the Holy Quran.
eQuran offers an enriching way to connect with the Holy Quran.

Whether you're seeking spiritual guidance, inspiration, or a comprehensive deeper understanding of the Quran. eQuran is your dedicated companion.

Features:
Themes: Choose from a selection of themes to personalize your reading experience.
Audio: Listen to the Holy Quran. 
Favorites: Save your favorite Surahs.
Last Read: View your last read Surahs.

Permissions required:
Internet: For streaming verses only.
Vibration: Haptic feedback for navigating between verses.
